entries.ammo_projectile: Basic ammunition used in projectile weapons.
entries.ammo_projectile_entanglement: Ammunition used in entanglement projectile weapons.
entries.axe_heavy_duty: A large, sturdy combat axe that lacks the complexity of its modern vibro-weapon counterparts, yet remains a dangerous weapon.
entries.axe_vibro: A vibro axe is a mundane-looking weapon with an ultrasonic generator in the handle. The ultrasonics reverberate along the blade's edge, granting the user greater cutting power with less effort. It is among the deadliest weapons in close combat.
entries.baton_avatar_trando_stun_stick: Trandoshan jailers often use these painful weapons to keep order amongst their Wookiee captives.
entries.baton_gaderiffi: Commonly known as the gaffi stick, this is the traditional weapon of the Tusken Raiders of Tatooine.  These are crafted from scrap metal scavenged from wrecked or abandoned vehicles and machinery in the Tatooine wastes.
entries.baton_stun: A short, powered club that can deliver a significant charge when it strikes a target.
entries.bestine_quest_sword: A prized weapon of ages past. The weapon is well-worn which suggests that it has seen many battles and was created out of tough, black metal. On the handle, a small plate can be seen, inscribed with the name "Justicator".
entries.blacksun_razor: A razor knuckler favored by Black Sun thugs and assassins.  The polished steel blades gleam when held in the light.
entries.blaster_pistol_barel: A metal tube that focuses and directs the energy from a blaster towards its intended target.
entries.blaster_pistol_barrel: A metal tube that focuses and directs the energy from a blaster towards its intended target.
entries.blaster_power_handler: This helps to regulate a blaster's power output.
entries.blaster_rifle_barrel: An elongated metal tube that focuses and directs the energy from a blaster towards its intended target.
entries.carbine_avatar_trando: The "Hall Sweeper" is a specially made carbine used to keep ultimate order in the tight corridors of the Avatar Space Platform.
entries.carbine_avatar_trando_e5: The Blackscale Trandoshans are well known for modifying weapons to suit their needs. This E5 has been heavily upgraded to be able to take down even the strongest of Wookiees.
entries.carbine_dc15: An old carbine used by the Republic troopers in the Clone Wars.
entries.carbine_e11_mark2: An upgraded version of the E11, strongly favored by Imperial troops for its lethal firepower.
entries.carbine_e11_quest: An E11 carbine.  This particular weapon has been fit with an inducer. The larger, faster energy bolt may cause bleeding in the target when hit.  This weapon requires the Marksman skill Carbine 2 in order to wield it proficiently.
entries.carbine_e11_victor_quest: The Lithitanium Carbine seems to have been created with a rare metal. It is light and seems to be well-balanced.
entries.carbine_geo: The Kalranoos carbine is named for a weapons engineer, Bobor Kalranoos, who made modifications to a Geonosian carbine and developed this hybrid weapon. This Kalranoos carbine comes from a collection of interesting and exotic weapons belonging to Sordaan Xris. Sordaan claims to have acquired the weapon in a wager with a Leresai bounty hunter.
entries.carbine_laser: A laser carbine is a medium-sized ranged weapon that deals out more damage than most laser pistols.
entries.carbine_nym_slugthrower: A deadly slug-thrower carbine fashioned by the infamous pirate Nym. Special features include a liquid piston shock-absorbing stock assembly, and advanced heat dissipation system for greater firepower for longer bursts than most carbines.
entries.carbine_republic_sfor: A carbine that fires a crippling shockwave, ripping opponent's skin apart.
entries.carbine_specops_bothan_carbine: BlasTech Industries' improved version of the Bothan's Bola Carbine; this model is often used by highly experienced members of the military as its action tends to require fine control for superior accuracy.
entries.chemical_dispersion_mechanism: This mechanism is responsible for a weapon's chemical dispersion.
entries.energization_crystals: Energization crystals can greatly increase the effectiveness of laser and blaster weapons.
entries.enhanced_destructive_pulse_channeling: This device is a component of some explosive devices that serves to improve the initial shock-wave propogation from a high-order detonation.
entries.ep3_loot_blackbane: The Sayormi witches are infamous for their skill with the Blackbane Nail, using it to fend off attacks while they prepare their deadly magical abilities.
entries.ep3_loot_blackfalcon: The Black Falcon was made to be the exact duplicate of a well-known smuggler who became famous throughout the Corellian space system.
entries.ep3_loot_blackhand: The Blackhand Annihilator was developed for use during the Clone Wars, but saw little use as its development came too late.  It's now a favored weapon among outcasts and scoundrels, but has seen some military use in recent years.
entries.ep3_loot_calibrated: The goal of all smugglers and slicers is to modify an existing weapon to achieve its most perfect state.  The Perfectly-Calibrated pistol is an example of such a weapon.  A normal everyday pistol tweaked to perfection in range, damage, and accuracy.
entries.ep3_loot_corellian: The Corellian Destroyer is a favorite among Commando's looking for big damage.
entries.ep3_loot_corestrike: Made during the Clone Wars, the Corestrike Rancor was a favorite among refugees and thugs.
entries.ep3_loot_darksting: The Darksting assassin was developed for use by raiding parties overtaking Imperial Cruisers.  The weapons are extremely accurate, their focused damage requiring a true marksman to wield them.
entries.ep3_loot_dawnsorrow: The Dawnsorrow rifle was used by Imperial squadrons on Tatooine who were tasked with eliminating the Tusken Raiders.  Though they never achieved their goal, their weapons are highly coveted.
entries.ep3_loot_deathrain: The Deathrain D-50 is modified version of the original sidearms worn by the Mandalorian warriors.  Its history as an extremely accurate and deadly pistol makes it a favorite among those who consider themselves expert pistoleers.
entries.ep3_loot_dragoneye: The famed bounty hunter who called himself Dragoneye developed this pistol himself, using scavenged parts from other weapons.  He himself made only one, but it grew in popularity as Dragoneye became more and more infamous among the criminal underworld.  Soon every bounty hunter had their own version of the "Dragoneye Reaper".  The C-10 model was developed by an outer rim company that owns the patent rights for this particular model.
entries.ep3_loot_eventide: The Eventide Smasher is a weapon of the Nefarious, a sword of incredible strength and weight.  Only the strongest warriors ever carried them, and the feel of the weapon tells you why.  It takes an extremely skilled fencer to even carry it properly, let alone use it in battle.
entries.ep3_loot_executer: Blessed with the same name as Darth Vader's own Star Destroyer, the Executer is a blade to be reckoned with.  Its firm grip and awesome blade indicate that very few stand up against it and live to tell the tale.
entries.ep3_loot_firestar: The Firestar 10-K. Found in the stomach of a fierce creature named Steelclaw.
entries.ep3_loot_grievance: A wicked carbine. It serves as one of Treun Lorn's forgotten creations.
entries.ep3_loot_heartstriker: The Sayormi Monks spend years training with the Heartstriker, named for its ability to crack thorugh the ribcages of even their most stalwart opponents.
entries.ep3_loot_hydra: Once the premier pistol used by the military forces of the Quohag sector, the Red Hydra pistols were decomissioned by Imperial Order.  The Z-5 is made by a small company who recently won the rights to begin production on a new line.  These weapons are favored by Squad Leaders who like the feel of the heavy weapon in their hands as they give orders to their men.
entries.ep3_loot_lifeblood: The Sayormi warriors are famed for their ability to spill the blood of even their most dangerous opponents.  The Lifeblood Cleaver is the preferred weapon of choice among the more bloodthirsty warriors.
entries.ep3_loot_liquidsilver: The Liquidsilver L7 is named for this weapons ability to blend into a cargo hold, allowing smugglers across the galaxy to get it into and out of dangerous situations.
entries.ep3_loot_mark: Exemplar Zheus' most trusted weapon and named-so after him for his bravery in battle. Now, many Outcasts wield such a weapon in honor of him.
entries.ep3_loot_necrosis: The Necrosis Nightblade is thought to be a legend, a weapon that never actually existed.  Stories of its power have made them much sought after, and it's believed that only Treun Lorn himself knew the whereabouts of a small stash of these weapons.
entries.ep3_loot_nullifier: The Nullifier X is a weapon created by Geonosian scientists.  It has been modified to fire incredibly powerful bursts at long range.
entries.ep3_loot_pestilence: The pikes known as Pestilence were named by the villagers who were overrun by the Deathswarm.  The description is fitting as the weapons put an end to almost all who fought against them.
entries.ep3_loot_poisonspike: A simple name for a simple pike, but don't let that taint this weapons lethal attributes.  Treun Lorn collected a number of these weapons and then destroyed anyone who used one without his permission.
entries.ep3_loot_quicktrigger: Easy to slice, the Quicktrigger Countermand comes at a high price. It is currently a popular item on the open market.
entries.ep3_loot_retaliation: The weapon known as the Covert Retaliation is a specially designed rifle that Bounty Hunters use when capture is not an option with their prey.  It is lightweight, easily portable, and extremely deadly.
entries.ep3_loot_retribution: Most Bounty Hunters prefer the Retribution Carbine for its light weight and quick response.
entries.ep3_loot_rhiss: Rhiss Mark-20 boasts its light weight with the deafening resonance of its shots.
entries.ep3_loot_rilctur: The Rilctur carbine is light in weight and has a gentle recoil. Named after General Rilctur of the Imperial Navy.
entries.ep3_loot_ripper: The Bloodshot Ripper is another of the infamous weapons that Treun Lorn collected and kept in his personal museum of deadly blades.  Fencers who used the Bloodshot Ripper were unheard of without a lifetime of rigorous training.
entries.ep3_loot_sharpshooter: The Vershyi corporation is famed for its long range weapons development teams.  They have perfected many scopes over the years for military use, but the Sharpshooter combines the best they have to offer in barrels, power output, and scope, resulting in a deadly long range weapon that has few competitors.
entries.ep3_loot_sickle: The curved blade of this sickle is honed to perfection, cutting with only the slightest bit of pressure. Cyrans the Unfeeling took great care to make sure its in the best condition possible at all times.  An unwary wielder could easily sever one of their own arteries, dying from the mere use of the blade.
entries.ep3_loot_silencer: Virtually silent, the Silencer is a must for any budding assassin. This weapon has been banned by the Empire for obvious reasons.
entries.ep3_loot_soulstinger: The Sayormi Queen had the Soulstinger developed for her personal use.  More deadly than even the Heartstriker, the Soulstinger is capable of destroying actual armor worn by her sworn enemies.  It takes a strong will to use this weapon and its deadly force.
entries.ep3_loot_strike: When they don't want to be too near an opponent, the Sayormi warriors use their assault lances, keeping out of the reach of shorter weapons while dealing deadly strikes.
entries.ep3_loot_void: The Void, a heavy weapon named after a heroic Commando in the early wars.
entries.galven_tube_circuits: These galven circuits help maintain a laser beam's cohesion over incredible distances.  These circuits are placed inside of a galven tube alongside galven coils, in line with the laser barrel.   Regular blasters generally have a more simplified version of this technology, compared to what is required for laser weaponry.
entries.grenade_bug_bomb: The Zicx-bug bomb is comprised of living "zicx" (native to the planet Tatooine) suspended in the mysterious digestive fluid of a Sarlacc. The weapon sports an explosive durasteel shrapnel casing and employs a firing mechanism common to the bulk of Imperial ordnance.
entries.grenade_cryoban: A vicious weapon that collects and freezes any moisture in an area so swiftly that the resulting violent explosion sends shards of ice flying in all directions. To throw a grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.
entries.grenade_fragmentation: The C22 Fragmentation Grenade, a more powerful version of the C12, is a variant of hand-thrown explosive charge which fills its immediate area with high-speed projectiles upon detonation. To throw the grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.  This grenade has no special effects beyond basic damage.
entries.grenade_fragmentation_light: The C12 Fragmentation Grenade is a variant of hand-thrown explosive charge which fills its immediate area with high-speed projectiles upon detonation. To throw the grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.  This grenade has no special effect beyond basic damage.
entries.grenade_glop: The glop grenade uses its relatively small explosive charge to disperse its deadly chemical payload in the area of the grenade upon detonation, immediately affecting those nearby. To throw a grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.  All opponents within close range of the detonation have a chance to be blinded for a short time by the chemicals released from this weapon.
entries.grenade_imperial_detonator: From time to time, Imperial Troops require a modest explosive weapon in their typical daily duties.  When such an explosive is required, the standard imperial detonator usually does the trick.  This weapon detonates with an extreme, short-range concussion that knocks down enemies within 20m of the detonation.
entries.grenade_proton: Proton grenades create large explosions from a small nuclear device. To throw a grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.  Due to a small EMP pulse emitted by the grenade, all vehicles within 30m of the detonation have a chance to malfunction, thus reducing the maximum speed of the vehicle for a short period of time.   Creature mounts are immune to this effect.
entries.grenade_thermal_detonator: Thermal detonators explosions unleash superheated plasma singeing anything nearby. To throw a grenade, click on it in your inventory and choose "throw".  Alternately, drag it into your toolbar, then use the corresponding toolbar key during combat to throw it. Grenades usually come in a stack.
entries.heavy_acid_beam: Projects a high-velocity stream of acid.  All opponents standing around a short range around the target of a Heavy Acid Beam attack may also be hit by the effects of this weapon.
entries.heavy_avatar_acid_beam: The Trandoshans only rarely use heavy weapons on board the Avatar Platform, but when they do this is their weapon of choice. The acid eats through armor and flest with equal ease but has no effect on the hardened walls and floors of the station.
entries.heavy_lightning_beam: Produces a massive discharge of focused electrical energy.
entries.knife_dagger: A modern dagger, as much style as substance.
entries.knife_naktra_crystal: This knife has been carved out of the strange Nak'tra crystal.
entries.knife_survival: A survival knife is all substance, no style. Small, light, and capable of doing decent damage.
entries.knife_trando_skinner: Wicked in appearance, the Sinew Wrapped Knife is fashioned from the remains of the ancient webweaver, Mother Ves'ad.
entries.knife_vibroblade: A standard dagger-looking weapon with an ultrasonic generator in the hilt. The ultrasonics reverberate along the blade edge, granting the user greater cutting power with less effort.
entries.knife_vibroblade_quest: A standard dagger-looking weapon with an ultrasonic generator in the hilt. The ultrasonics reverberate along the blade edge, granting the user greater cutting power with less effort.  This particular weapon has a serrated blade that may cause the target to bleed when struck.  This weapon requires the Brawler skill One-Handed 2 in order to wield it proficiently.
entries.lance_avatar_wke_heartlance: Wookiees have modified the standard vibrolance to better suit their exceptional size and strength.
entries.lance_lightsaber: A two-bladed lightsaber. An elegant weapon from ancient times. Not as clumsy or random as a blaster.
entries.lance_lightsaber_gen1: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold two crystals.  A Modified Jedi weapon which has a second emitter matrix on the opposite end of the handgrip creating a double-blade. It consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the series of crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.
entries.lance_lightsaber_gen2: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold three crystals.  A Modified Jedi weapon which has a second emitter matrix on the opposite end of the handgrip creating a double-blade. It consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the series of crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.
entries.lance_lightsaber_gen3: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold four crystals.  A Modified Jedi weapon which has a second emitter matrix on the opposite end of the handgrip creating a double-blade. It consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the series of crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.
entries.lance_lightsaber_gen4: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold five crystals.  A Modified Jedi weapon which has a second emitter matrix on the opposite end of the handgrip creating a double-blade. It consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the series of crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.
entries.lance_lightsaber_gen5: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold six crystals.  A Modified Jedi weapon which has a second emitter matrix on the opposite end of the handgrip creating a double-blade. It consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the series of crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.
entries.lance_som_obsidian: A lance with ends made from the sharpest of obsidian shards.
entries.lance_som_xandank: A lance with very elaborate ends used to slice tissue apart.
entries.lance_staff_metal: A carefully balanced long metal shaft capable of delivering a crushing blow.
entries.lance_staff_wood_s1: An effective weapon crafted from a solid, yet slightly flexible piece of wood.
entries.lance_staff_wood_s2: An effective weapon crafted with a solid wooden shaft, flexible metallic core, durable iron surface, and crystalline balance tabs.
entries.lance_trando: This weapon is more wielded to instill fear in the Trandoshan's opponents than for its quality.
entries.lance_vibro_axe: A vibro axe is a mundane-looking weapon with an ultrasonic generator in the handle. The ultrasonics reverberate along the blade edge, granting the user greater cutting power with less effort. It is among the deadliest weapons in close combat.
entries.lance_vibrolance: A powered weapon that vibrates rapidly upon impact dramatically increasing the amount of damage delivered while minimizing the effort required by the wielder.
entries.lance_wookiee: A frightening weapon in the hands of the strong Wookiee species.
entries.laser_cannon_cooling_sleeve: Laser cannons generate excessive heat while in use, and cooling sleeves are an important part of the sophisticated cooling system that is used to protect sensitive internal components.
entries.laser_cannon_cooling_sleve: Laser cannons generate excessive heat while in use, and cooling sleeves are an important part of the sophisticated cooling system that is used to protect sensitive internal components.
entries.laser_cannon_gun_tube: A gun-tube for a laser cannon.
entries.laser_magnetic_flashback_supressor: A crescent-shaped device at the end of some laser barrels, a flashback suppressor is designed to prevent occasionally unstable laser beams from damaging the barrel.
entries.metal_fasteners: Metal fasteners used as snaps and buttons on clothing.
entries.mine_a_v: An anti-vehicular mine can cause intensely destructive damage to enemy vehicles.
entries.mine_drx: A DRX mine can inflict heavy damage to unsuspecting enemies.
entries.mine_xg: A XG mine can inflict heavy damage to unsuspecting enemies.
entries.pistol: A small gun that can be fired with one hand, good for medium range combat.
entries.pistol_avatar_trando_special: A roughed and powerful sidearm for all occasions. Finished with a fine chrome this weapon is the envy of many junior Trandoshans.
entries.pistol_de_10: The DE-10 pistol is used mainly by Death Watch soldiers.  Its bolts are common sights to their enemies, and its hefty weight gives it a feeling of being a formidable weapon in trained hands.
entries.pistol_dl44_metal: A DL-44 XT.  An extended design on the DL-44, using a metal housing that gives the weapon a more substantial feel as well as increased accuracy due to the improved balance.
entries.pistol_dl44_metal_light: A lighter version of the DL-44 XT, also features a metal housing but lacking some of the balancing weights that have been incorporated in the upgraded version.
entries.pistol_flare: The Tchotchee pistol is a variant of the flare pistol, and is considered by many to be more trendy and stylish. The Tchotchee pistol made its debut on the hip of Joh'hanna Ghibbyyns, an infamous and hip bounty hunter from Talus.
entries.pistol_flechette: The Vexa Flechette Pistol is modeled after anti-personnel missiles that release a hail of darts at a target. The Vexa model is favored by Rodian hunters for dire situations, such as when they lose control of the hunt. This one come from the weapon collection of Ziven Tissak.
entries.pistol_fwg5_quest: A FWG5 pistol.  This particular weapon has been crafted with ultra-lightweight materials. This provides the user with greater accuracy and mobility.
entries.pistol_geonosian_sonic_blaster: Emits a concentration of sonic energy within a plasma containment sphere.  On striking the target, the sphere is broken releasing an omni-directional blast of sonic energy.  This weapon requires Pistol Techniques II to use.
entries.pistol_ion_stunner: A rare weapon that uses ion particles to stun the target. WARNING: Excessive use on a single target may cause injury, even fatality.
entries.pistol_kyd21: A compact pistol with good stopping power considering its small size. It's expensive but favored by successful bounty hunters and assassins for its subtlety.
entries.pistol_launcher: This weapon fires a suite of small target-seeking rockets with explosive tips.  In the hands of a Commando, the rockets can cause fire damage over time.
entries.pistol_republic_blaster: The venerable Naboo Security Forces side-arm.
entries.pistol_republic_blaster_quest: The venerable Naboo Security Forces side-arm.  This particular weapon has been fit with an inducer. The larger, faster energy bolt may cause bleeding in the target when hit.
entries.pistol_scatter: This advanced version of the scatter pistol spreads blaster bolts over a wider area than the standard scatter pistol causing even greater destruction than the standard Scatter Pistol.
entries.pistol_scatter_light: This pistol spreads blaster bolts over a wider area than normal blaster weapons.
entries.pistol_trando_suppressor: This Trandoshan suppressor pistol was manufactured with the intent of subduing the target without causing too much damage. Being hit by the weapon causes excruciating pain, much to the Trandoshans' delight.
entries.pistol_wookiee: This slim pistol is an unusual weapon among the Wookiees, so small in size. Its use is mainly by guards in areas where brandishing a large weapon would be considered inappropriate.
entries.pistol_wookiee_bowcaster: This weapon is mainly used by Wookiee scouts when they need maximum mobility while traversing the trees of Kashyyyk.
entries.projectile_pistol_barrel: Projectile pistol barrels guide and direct projectiles that are propelled via a pistol's firing mechanism.
entries.projectile_rifle_barrel: Projectile rifle barrels guide and direct projectiles that are propelled via a rifle's firing mechanism.
entries.rifle_acid_beam: This weapon discharges lethal pulses of concentrated acid, and powerful streams of corrosive liquid.
entries.rifle_adventurer: A favored rifle of many Rodian hunters, the Fallann Hyper-Rifle shoots a self-propelled shell with excellent accuracy over great distances. Traditionally used in the infamous Midnight Hunter's Duel when two hunters have a dispute that cannot be settled any other way.
entries.rifle_avatar_laser_trando: The Blackscale have modified this rifle to be better suited for the tight corridors of the Avatar Space Platform. With the stock removed the rifle is far more maneuverable.
entries.rifle_berserker: A slugthrower, mostly used by Imperial Special Tactical Forces.
entries.rifle_bowcaster: This bowcaster is a light version of the traditional ranged weapon of Wookiees.  More powerful bowcasters may be wielded by Wookiees with additional Rifleman training.
entries.rifle_bowcaster_heavy: This bowcaster is the heavy assault version of the traditional ranged weapon of Wookiees.   This bowcaster is extremely lethal and makes for a formidable opponent on any battlefield.
entries.rifle_bowcaster_medium: This bowcaster is a medium recon version of the traditional ranged weapon of Wookiees.   This bowcaster is more powerful than the light version, yet is still light enough to be practical for long treks into the wilderness.
entries.rifle_dc15: An old blaster rifle used by the Republic troopers in the Clone Wars.
entries.rifle_dlt20a: An advanced version of the DLT20 rifle.
entries.rifle_ewok_crossbow: The primitive crossbow weapon is a stunning testament to Ewok ingenuity. Carefully constructed of endorian hardwood, the device features with a heavy resin-coated sinew that can shoot small, stone projectiles at lethal velocities.
entries.rifle_faux_bowcaster: A new type of bowcaster that Kressik wanted you to investigate. This bowcaster seems to be a poorly designed device.
entries.rifle_flame_thrower: Produces an extremely devastating stream of fire by igniting flammable plasma liquids held under high pressure.  This weapon will hit all targets within a narrow cone up to the maximum distance of the weapon.   All affected targets have a chance to catch on fire for a short period of time.  This Fire DOT will only affect the Health pool.
entries.rifle_flame_thrower_light: Produces a stream of fire by igniting flammable liquids held under high pressure.  This weapon will hit multiple targets within a narrow cone up to the maximum distance of the weapon.   All affected targets have a chance to catch on fire for a short period of time.  This Fire DOT will only affect the Health pool.
entries.rifle_geo_drill: A Genosian Drill.  This mining tool is capable of causing great damage to living beings.
entries.rifle_jawa_ion: A Jawa Ionization rifle, these are generally cheaply made but are often effective at disabling droids and machinery.
entries.rifle_laser: Advanced Laser rifles are designed for maximum damage at medium to long range.  This upgraded model of the laser rifle uses advanced Mon Calamari optics to generate a triple focused beam that is especially destructive.
entries.rifle_laser_light: Laser rifles are designed for maximum damage at medium to long range.
entries.rifle_laser_noob: Laser rifles are designed for good damage at medium to long range.
entries.rifle_lightning: This is an advanced version of the Lightning Rifle which emits bursts of extremely concentrated electrical energy.
entries.rifle_lightning_heavy: This is an heavy version of the Lightning Rifle  which emits bursts of extremely concentrated electrical energy.  Favored by Bounty Hunters throughout the universe.
entries.rifle_lightning_light: The Lightning Rifle emits bursts of concentrated electrical energy.
entries.rifle_naktra_crystal: Nak'tra is a Myyydril word meaning deadly.  The Nak'tra crystal rifle uses a specially modified crystal beamsplitter to make the deadly blasts fired from its barrels even more powerful.
entries.rifle_odararissl: Named after a prominent Society figure, Odara'Risll was known for her quick reflexes and remarkable aim. Odara'Risll roughly translates into "the blood of the hunter" in the ancient Outcast language.
entries.rifle_proton: The Proton Rifle was used by the Rodian Hunters to hunt the largest prey on their homeworld.  It has found favor among the Commando set for its light weight and deadly accuracy.
entries.rifle_quest_tusken: The ancient long-rifle of a dreaded Tusken King who plagued the first settlers in Bestine for many cycles.
entries.rifle_tenloss_dxr6_disruptor: Utilizing an oversized XCiter, the actuating blaster module can process a much greater volume of blaster gas, resulting in a devastating shot.
entries.rifle_trando_hunter: A fairly accurate hunting rifle created and used by the Trandoshan species.
entries.rifle_trando_hunter_crafted: The Mark-1B version of the Trandoshan Hunter's Rifle.
entries.rifle_victor_tusken: The Lithitanium Rifle appears to be a direct copy of the Tusken Rifle, though built with an unknown metal component. It is light and well-balanced.
entries.rocket_launcher: An extremely destructive weapon, a rocket launcher is not meant to be used by those who are unknowledgeable with its intricacies.  In the hands of a Commando, this weapon can set some enemies on fire.
entries.scope_weapon: A weapon's scope can increase its accuracy, if used.
entries.shield_generator_personal_b: A medium-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters.
entries.shield_generator_personal_borvo_d: A high-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters. This is a reproduction of the model used by Borvo the Hutt.
entries.shield_generator_personal_c: A high-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters.
entries.shield_generator_personal_droideka_d: A high-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters. This model is of the type used by droideka modified to be compatible with humanoids.
entries.shield_generator_personal_imperial_test: A high-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters. It's a test prototype developed by the top scientists of the Empire.
entries.shield_generator_personal_old_republic_d: A high-powered personal shield generator unit, used to reduce damage and increase the wearer's odds of surviving hostile encounters. This model was in use during the days of the Old Republic.
entries.som_hvy_lava_cannon: Produces an extremely devastating path of destruction by spewing large globs of highly flammable lava like substance.   The lava splash will hit all opponents within a short range of the target.   In the hands of a Commando, all targets have a chance to be damaged over time by fire.
entries.som_hvy_republic_flamer: Produces an extremely devastating stream of fire by igniting flammable plasma liquids held under high pressure.  This weapon will hit all targets within a narrow cone up to the maximum distance of the weapon.   All affected targets have a chance to catch fire for a short period of time.  This Fire DOT will only affect the Health pool.
entries.som_pistol_disruptor_pistol: A pistol that creates a disruption effect being initiated within the target that causes the vaporization of body tissue.
entries.som_pistol_ion_relic: A rare weapon that uses ion particles to puncture the target causing severe damage.
entries.som_rifle_dp23: A blaster rifle similar looking to the one used by the Republic troopers in the Clone Wars.  This model has a power cell alteration that would be considered too risky to be used by Imperial troops.  Favored by Bounty Hunters throughout the universe.
entries.som_rifle_mustafar_disruptor: A rifle that creates a disruption effect being initiated within the target that causes the vaporization of body tissue.
entries.stock_unit: A stock unit, used in rifle assembly.
entries.sword_01: Swords can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  Some swords can be exceedingly sharp and sturdy, making them dangerous weapons in close combat.
entries.sword_02: Swords can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  Some swords can be exceedingly sharp and sturdy, making them dangerous weapons in close combat.
entries.sword_2h_avatar_wke_toothpick: Forged with the finest of Kashyyykian steel, these large and dangerous axes have earned the nickname "Wookiee Toothpick".
entries.sword_2h_axe: Axes can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  The heft of the axe, combined with its razor-sharp edge makes it a devastating weapon for medium-ranged combat.
entries.sword_2h_axe_quest: Axes can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  The heft of the axe, combined with its razor-sharp edge makes it a devastating weapon for medium-ranged combat.  This battleaxe, having previously been used by the Gamorrean guards in Jabba's palace, is tarnished and unclean.
entries.sword_2h_blacksun_hack: The Executioner's Hack is a favorite weapon of Black Sun operatives.  It's balanced as a two-handed weapon, and its light weight allows it to be used like a sword.
entries.sword_2h_cleaver: Swords can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  Some swords can be exceedingly sharp and sturdy, making them dangerous weapons in close combat.
entries.sword_2h_katana: Swords can vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  Some swords can be exceedingly sharp and sturdy, making them dangerous weapons in close combat.
entries.sword_2h_katana_quest: A long and gently curved sword, exceedingly sharp and sturdy, makes it a dangerous weapon in close combat.  This particular weapon has a narrow groove running down the flat of the blade. Bleeding may occur in the target when struck by this sword.
entries.sword_2h_maul: Although they are invariably destructive in close-quarter combat, Battle Hammers may vary greatly in effectiveness depending on the quality of the materials used and the skill of the Weaponsmith.  Mauls and battle hammers are designed to deliver extra-heavy blows in melee combat, leaving bone-crushing damage in their wake.
entries.sword_acid: Sordaan Xris renamed this variation of an acid sword after himself, a Xris Acid Sword, even though it was actually redesigned and modified by Harroom.
entries.sword_blade_rantok: This forged steel sword was the traditional weapon of the Unfyr Warriors of the Ka'hren.
entries.sword_blade_ryyk: A weapon that finds its origin on Kashyyyk, the ryyk blade is the traditional melee weapon carried by a Wookiee.  Ryyk blades can vary in design based on their specific origin, but generally consist of sharpened blades with hide-wrapped grips.
entries.sword_curved_nyax: A sword used by a follower of Lord Nyax.
entries.sword_junti_mace: The Junti Mace was long thought to be a myth until it was rediscovered by an explorer known only as The Planetwalker. This one comes from Ziven Tissak's private collection of weapons.
entries.sword_lightsaber_gen1: This lightsaber will not power on without one color crystal inside.  This version of saber may hold two crystals.  A Traditional Jedi weapon, it consists of a cylindrical handle in which sophisticated circuits channel a beam of light through a series of crystals.  These crystals modulate the blade's size and amplitude. When activated, internal power cells create photoelectric energy which is focused through the crystals.  The energy is formed into a tight, parallel beam of coherent packets. These packets are emitted through a positively-charged continuous energy lens which projects the packets away from the lightsaber. The packets are almost immediately attracted back to the lightsaber by a negatively-charged high-energy flux aperture, and then continually recycled to create the glowing blade. The packets are recycled by a superconductor back into the power cell for re-energizing. The entire process is completely contained. No heat is generated and no energy is lost, since the light in the blade is recaptured.

entries.sword_marauder: Wielded by the Arena Champion, the blade appears mighty and bespeaks honor among the Kerritamba people.
entries.sword_massassi: Given by Chief Kallaarac, the Urnsor'is SoulLeecher is a testament to the strength of the Urnsor'is creature.
entries.sword_nyax: A sword used by a follower of Nyax.
entries.sword_som_2h_obsidian: A very large sword favored by the Mustafarians, made from the sharpest of obsidian slabs.
entries.sword_som_2h_tulrus: Despite the size of this sword it is balanced as if it was made of a much lighter material.
entries.sword_som_mustafar_bandit: A sword made and used by the bandits found on Mustafar.
entries.sword_som_obsidian: A sword favored by the Mustafarians, made from the sharpest of obsidian shards.
entries.sword_wookiee: Blade of Nyenthi'Oris, or "of the Great Tree", glitters with the pride of the Kerritamba people and is only given to the most honorable of citizens.
entries.turbo_laser_gun_tube: This is the gun tube for a turbolaser.
entries.vibro_unit: A vibro-unit can turn a normal blade or axe into a much more destructive weapon by creating thousands of microscopic vibrations a second, greatly improving its cutting ability.
entries.vibroknuckler: A blunt melee weapon equipped with a vibro-unit.  These are held in one hand, and can badly injure or kill an enemy.
entries.victor_baton_gaderiffi: Black Metal Gaderiffi Baton seems to have been made with an ink-like metal. It is light, durable and well-balanced.
entries.warhead_chemical: This warhead is designed to disperse lethal chemicals.
entries.warhead_fusing_mechanism: This is responsible for the warhead fuse's ignition.
entries.warhead_heavy: This warhead is designed for a massive explosion.
entries.warhead_light: This warhead is designed for minimum collateral damage.
entries.warhead_stabilizer: This device is necessary to keep the warhead's payload stable during motion and launch.
entries.weapon_mount: A mount that allows a weapon to be attached to it.
entries.weapon_mount_light: A mount for use with lighter weapons.
entries.weapon_targeting_computer: A weapon's targeting computer helps determine the range to the target, and can greatly help a gunner's accuracy.
entries.weapon_trajectory_computer: A weapon's trajectory computer can help determine the trajectory of a target.
entries.wookiee_knuckler: The Knuckles of the Katarn are hand made by Krepauk and are awarded to those who defeat a katarn on the Rryatt Trail.
entries.carbine_slug: A deadly slug-thrower carbine. Special features include a liquid piston shock-absorbing stock assembly, and advanced heat dissipation system for greater firepower for longer bursts than most carbines.
entries.heavy_crusader_m_xx: The Crusader M-XX Heavy Rifle is a heavy weapon that fires a deadly explosive bolt that hits multiple targets when it explodes.
entries.baton_gaderiffi_elite: Commonly known as the gaffi stick, this is the traditional weapon of the Tusken Raiders of Tatooine. This particularly rare version of the weapon is modeled after the one used by the leader of the Tusken Raiders.
entries.rifle_tusken_elite: This rifle is patterned after the type used by the leader of the Tusken Raiders.
entries.backpack_krayt_skull: A replica of the backpack with the rather imposing appearance worn by the leader of the Tusken Raiders.
entries.polearm_heroic_sd_d: This particular weapon is fitted with an ultrasonic generator in the handle but it also includes tiny micro-pores in the blade that exude a corrosive acid. The ultrasonics reverberate along the blade's edge, granting the user greater cutting power with less effort while the acids soften the area struck by the weapon making subsequent blows from the blade even more damaging.
entries.carbine_heroic_sd: A heavily modified carbine firing acid filled ballistic rounds accelerated to extreme velocities. The projectiles create a distinct whistling sound as they cut through the air and their targets.
entries.pistol_heroic_sd: This pistol shoots small projectiles that release a dangerous acidic compound on impact that can be dangerous both to biological and mechanical entities. Its wide mouth and long stylized sights resembling fins no doubt led to this weapon's nickname.
entries.pistol_heroic_exar_d: The DL-T is a pistol undergoing tests and should not be available to the general public.  It is named 'DL-T', due to its unclassified test status.
entries.converted_weapon_schem: This is a weapon schematic generated out of a weapon from an older crafting system. Take it to a munitions trader to craft a new weapon appearance.
entries.knife_survival_decorative: This is a decorative replica of a real survival knife,  it does no damage.
entries.rifle_a280: Though much heavier than Imperial-issue rifles such as the E-11, the A280 was a sturdy weapon and was reputed to be able to cut a fully-armored stormtrooper in half at medium range. This weapon, along with its predecessor, the DLT-20A, were marketed as Longblasters. The A280 was different from the DLT-20A in that its galven circuits were clustered near the focusing crystal, giving the weapon a slight bulge at the midsection. This also provided the A280 with more power over a longer range.
entries.rifle_eweb: A modified version of the 'Emplacement Weapon, Heavy Blaster'. This rifle is more portable than the original, but at the cost of some of the immense damage.
entries.sword_lightsaber_one_handed_pvp_bf: Replica of one of the many variations of lightsabers the Sith once employed.
entries.sword_lightsaber_polearm_pvp_bf: Replica of the double-bladed lightsaber once used by Darth Phobos.
entries.sword_lightsaber_two_handed_pvp_bf: Saber replica made from the remains of a lightsaber found in the debris from the Death Star.
entries.sword_lightsaber_one_handed_gcw_s01_gen4: a fourth generation Darth Sidious Lightsaber.
entries.sword_lightsaber_one_handed_gcw_s01_gen5: a fifth generation Darth Sidious Lightsaber.
entries.sword_lightsaber_two_handed_gcw_s01_gen4: a fourth generation Darth Sidious Lightsaber.
entries.sword_lightsaber_two_handed_gcw_s01_gen5: a fifth generation Darth Sidious Lightsaber.
entries.pistol_dh18a_gcw_n: A Dh-18a Pistol Prototype. This early prototype pistol was created by BlasTech Industries in an effort to update the polular DH-17.
entries.rifle_tc22_blaster: An updated version of the TC-22 Blaster Rifle design. An inscription etched in the barrel reads "Rule by the Strong."
entries.pistol_dh18a_gcw_d: This early prototype pistol was created by BlasTech Industries in an effort to update the popular DH-17.
